title: A Closer Look: Trump's Cruel Budget Caps off Bad Week | Interview: Erin Gibson & Bryan Safi
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's latest travel ban block, the debunking of his wiretapping claims and his drastic new budget plan.
Then, he talks to Throwing Shade's Erin Gibson and Bryan Safi, who fill Seth in on Second Lady Karen Pence's towel charm business, and about some new additions to their shade list. Late Night producer Kevin Miller then speaks to them backstage at Studio 8G for a few more questions.
